text: Ninad Gangadhar Bedekar (17 August 1949 - 10 May 2015) was an Indian historian, writer and orator. He was from Pune, Maharashtra, India. He wrote many books and also wrote scripts from television shows such as Son et lumi√®re show and for the television serial Peshwai. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2015 deaths Category:20th-century Indian writers Category:Indian historians Category:People from Pune Category:Marathi people
title: Ninad Bedekar
